name: drive (prototype)
description:
small prototype of driving game with focus on rumble

GAMEPAD RECOMMENDED

Speed change: 

Right stick    -OR-   D-Pad Up/Down   -OR-   W / S   -OR-   Up arrow / Down arrow

Steering:

Left stick   -OR-   D-Pad L/R   -OR-   A / D   -OR-   Left arrow / Right arrow

Lights:

E   -OR-   West button on gamepad

Quit Game:

Escape key   -OR-   Start button on gamepad
